author: rubys
msg: Update to match the latest Compiler.java interface

author: rubys
msg: Eliminate unnecessary calls to getClassName, which is implemented by
parsing the actual class file.  Prior to this change, this method was
called twice even if the generated servlet was up to date!

author: mandar
msg: * Fix for line numbers in the generated Servlet
so that they match the actual location of Tags
* Added a new type of CharDataGenerator that maps
each HTML line to a Java "println". This seems
to be really useful for debugging and tools.
To use this add to the JspServlet conf. the following:

author: costin
msg: - Error checking - don't start in a wrong directory
- ErrorServlet - if the default error can't be found, remove the context
- ContextManager.init() - if contextInit() throws TomcatException, remove
the context and report the error.
- ErrorServlet - detect loops in default error servlet, if an error happens
